CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Withholding" ), "Withholding; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Unemployment" ), "Unemployment; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Local: Local Service Tax (LST)" ), "Local: Local Service Tax (LST); ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Local: Local Occupational Tax (OPT)" ), "Local: Local Occupational Tax (OPT); ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Local: Income Tax (EIT, City, etc)" ), "Local: Income Tax (EIT, City, etc); ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Local: Other" ), "Local: Other; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "WorkersComp" ), "WorkersComp; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Paid Family Medical Leave" ), "Paid Family Medical Leave; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Garnishments / Child Support" ), "Garnishments / Child Support; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "New Hire Reporting" ), "New Hire Reporting; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Unclaimed Property" ), "Unclaimed Property; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "State Retirement Plan" ), "State Retirement Plan; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Unsupported" ), "Unsupported; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Gusto Local Generic" ), "Gusto Local Generic; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Collector" ), "Collector; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Tax_Type_Tax_Topic__c , "Combined-Report" ), "Combined-Report; ",null )
